statements: DELETE FROM RFID_Inventory_Tracking WHERE location = 'Warehouse A' AND product_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
DELETE FROM RFID_Inventory_Tracking WHERE device_id = '89abcd12-3456-7890-cdef-1234567890ab' AND quantity > 10;
DELETE FROM InventoryManagement WHERE quantity <= 10 AND location = 'Warehouse';
DELETE FROM Inventory WHERE location = 'warehouse' AND quantity < 10;
DELETE FROM RFID_Data WHERE device_id = 101 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM Inventory WHERE product_id = 500 AND quantity > 100 AND location = 'Warehouse';
DELETE FROM Tracking WHERE location = 'Warehouse B' AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
